name: Escape Earth (BryanOArt)
description:
Team Name

Shooting Comet

Objective:

Survive from ghost made up in your mind long enough until spaceship is ready to launch. Don't let the spaceship fuel go out, collect the orbs to keep the spaceship working to survive. 

Controls:
WASD - Move

Right Click - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

E - Interact

Left Shift - Regenerate

Escape - Pause

Space - Jump
